#### **Open source tools for sports analytics**

Scrape and analyze data for NHL hockey with the `chickenstats` python package. Go to the
`chickenstats` [documentation](https://chickenstats.com/latest/) for more information

#### **Musings on Tennessee sports**

Subscribe to the [chicken and stats blog](https://chickenandstats.com) for in-depth analysis of the
Nashville Predators, Tennessee Titans, and Tennessee Volunteers. Follow along with code examples at the
[blog section](/blog) of this site
